name: Stop the invasion
description:
Why I made this

I was board one day, so I dicided to make this! I hope you guys enjoy it, and have fun playing it!

Plot

Your playing as a space man who has a part time job as a NASA electrician, and you were just given your first task to fix the space stations communication systems. Suddenly you look out the window and see 3 UFO's moving towards the earth to invade! So in order to save all your friends and family from the aliens that the UFO's are dropping into the earths atmoshere, you have to use your taser gun to kill the aliens and save everyone you love from being inslaved by aliens!

How to play

To kill the aliens, just click on them with your mouse! However the drop a bit fast, so you need to have some fast reflexes to get a big score.

Now there is no real end to this game sadly, this is one of those games where you just try to get as far as you can. You can challenge your friends, your family members, your neighbors, exedra!
